# Budget Window Pros

## Company Overview

Budget Window Pros is a locally owned and operated window replacement company with over 15 years of experience. We specialize in residential window replacement, sliding door installation, and energy-efficient home upgrades. Our factory-certified installation crews handle everything from single window replacements to full-home window packages.

## Services

### Window Replacement
Upgrade old, drafty windows with modern, energy-efficient models. We install single-hung, double-hung, casement, bay, bow, and specialty shape windows from top brands including Andersen, Pella, and Milgard.

### Sliding & Patio Doors
Beautiful sliding glass doors and patio door systems that bring the outdoors in. Smooth operation and superior insulation with premium hardware.

### Full Home Window Packages
Save with complete home window replacement packages. We measure, recommend, and install every window in your home at a bundled price.

### Emergency Window Repair
Rapid-response window repair and temporary boarding services available same-day to keep your home safe and secure after breakage or storm damage.

### Energy Audits
Free window energy audit that identifies problem areas, assesses heat loss, and recommends cost-effective window solutions to reduce energy bills by up to 30%.

### Warranty & Maintenance
Comprehensive lifetime warranty covering materials, labor, and seal failure on all installations. Annual maintenance programs available.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**How much does window replacement cost?**
Costs vary based on window type, size, and materials. We offer free in-home estimates with no obligation, plus full home packages for maximum savings and flexible financing.

**How long does installation take?**
Most installations are completed in a single day. Full home replacements may take 1-3 days depending on window count.

**Do new windows save energy?**
Yes. Energy-efficient windows can reduce energy bills by up to 30% with Low-E glass and argon gas fills.

**What warranty is included?**
Every installation includes a comprehensive lifetime warranty covering materials, labor, and seal failure.

**Do you offer financing?**
Yes. We offer flexible financing options to fit your budget. Ask about our monthly payment plans during your free consultation.
